thread.title: Former River Hawk Games of the Week: October 26
thread.title_full: Former River Hawk Games of the Week: October 26

author: Justin Soderberg
title: Former River Hawk Games of the Week: October 26
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
The UMass Lowell River Hawks have 18 former student athletes playing professional hockey in the National Hockey League (NHL), American Hockey League (AHL) or ECHL this season. 
Each week we will give you our picks for the “Former River Hawk Games of the Week,” likely one for each league, however, if we see fit that there are no games of the week in SHARE
